definition[0]: a raised part on a racing car that prevents the car from lifting off the road at high speeds
definition[1]: part of an aircraft wing that can be lifted up to slow the plane down
definition[2]: someone or something that prevents another person or thing from being successful
definition[3]: a person or team that spoils anotherâ€™s winning record
definition[4]: a message or report that is intended to ruin the surprising part of a popular film, book etc by telling people about the surprise before they see or read it
